title: ranked
body: why cant i view more stats for ranked, when i click into league it dont give me the option to view my full ranked stats like other seasons

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is currently a [known bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select) with no ETA for a fix. Just going to have to wait it out.
